jcr:content.searchTitle: Gaming Devices for the Serious Gamer
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G obsesses over every detail to give you winning gaming devices—mice, keyboards, headsets and controllers. Gaming is our passion.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G – Gaming Devices for the Serious Gamer

copy_block.description: Play at your peak with the highest performance gaming equipment from Logitech G.
copy_block.title: Advanced Gaming Gear

copyblock.mainDescription: Designed with and for the world’s leading esports professionals.

player_quote.playerQuotation: It helps me be as precise and confident as I need to be so we can win. I used to think wireless was too slow for gaming, but now I am on the world stage completely confident in the performance of my Logitech G LIGHTSPEED wireless mouse.

copyblock.mainDescription: Logitech G proudly sponsor hundreds of esports professionals to advance gaming through collaboration.
Logitech G actively partners with game creators to achieve amazingly immersive gaming experiences.
Synchronized lighting technology that immerses you into the action with reactive game-driven effects and more.

navigation.altText: PRO Series: Shop Gear Designed with and for Pros
